title: Knife, 18th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Silver gilt blade leaf-shaped, waisted bolster. Banded ferrule, tapering porcelain handle, irregular in shape. Multi-colored handle on white ground. On front a man in costume, standing next to a tree, on the back a woman in similar position. Gold decoration on dark blue ground along the sides and top of handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, 18th century.
18th century. silver, gold, porcelain. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-219.
